Homebridge with Config UI X.more_info: Homebridge is a lightweight NodeJS server that emulates the iOS HomeKit API.

HomebridgewithConfigUIX.tag: tag of the docker image, if any. latest is used by default.>
HomebridgewithConfigUIX.launch_order: 1 or above. If there are multiple containers and they must be started in order, specify here.>

/volume.description: This is where the config is stored
/volume.label: Homebridge Config Storage

PUID.description: User ID for homebridge to be run with.
PUID.label: User ID

PGID.description: Group ID for homebridge to be run with.
PGID.label: Group ID
